Class UTF8ByteStreamRule

java.lang.Object
gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.AbstractValidationRule
gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.UTF8ByteStreamRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationRule, org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class UTF8ByteStreamRule extends AbstractValidationRule
Tests that a file has only legal UTF-8 byte sequences.
